data.comment: Bert Put starts the match. Eupen with the kick-off in Eupen.
Jens Cools is booked for the home team.
In the minute 13, Goal! Julien Ngoy gives Eupen a 1-0 lead.
St. Truidense's Samuel Asamoah has been booked in Eupen.
Jonathan Heris (Eupen) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 30, The home team replace Isaac Nuhu with Andreas Beck.
The first-half is over.
Andreas Beck (Eupen) has received a yellow card from Bert Put.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. St. Truidense with the kick-off.
Chris Durkin is replacing Samuel Asamoah for St. Truidense at Kehrweg Stadium.
Jhonny Lucas for St. Truidense has been booked by Bert Put and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 59, Eupen make their second substitution with Mamadou Kone replacing Knowledge Musona.
Adriano is replacing Nils Schouterden for the home team.
Samy Mmaee (St. Truidense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Tatsuya Ito is on a sub for Jhonny Lucas for St. Truidense.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Facundo Colidio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a third substitution, with Nelson Balongo replacing Santiago Colombatto.
In the minute 82, Mamadou Kone (Eupen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, St. Truidense have been given a penalty at Kehrweg Stadium...
At Kehrweg Stadium, Benoit Poulain has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! Yuma Suzuki makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
